00001 #include "eol_mouse.h"
00002 #include "eol_sprite.h"
00003 #include "eol_graphics.h"
00004 
00005 typedef struct
00006 {
00007   eolInt      x,y;
00008   eolInt      ox,oy;
00009   eolUint     buttons;
00010   eolUint     oldButtons;
00011   eolUint     lastButtons;
00012   eolUint     timePress; /*this time index*/
00013   eolUint     lastPress; /*time index of the last time this input was pressed*/
00014   eolSprite * sprite;
00015   eolUint     frame;
00016   eolInt      showHide;
00017 }eolMouse;

00019 eolMouse _eol_mouse;
00020 eolLine  _eol_mouse_file;
00021 eolInt   _eol_mouse_frame_width = -1;
00022 eolInt   _eol_mouse_frame_height = -1;

00024 void eol_mouse_close()
00025 {
00026   eol_sprite_free(&_eol_mouse.sprite);
00027   memset(&_eol_mouse,0,sizeof(eolMouse));
00028 }
00029 
00030 void eol_mouse_init()
00031 {
00032   memset(&_eol_mouse,0,sizeof(eolMouse));
00033   _eol_mouse.sprite = eol_sprite_load(_eol_mouse_file,
00034                                       _eol_mouse_frame_width,
00035                                       _eol_mouse_frame_height);
00036   SDL_ShowCursor(SDL_DISABLE);
00037   atexit(eol_mouse_close);
00038 }
00039 
00040 void eol_mouse_config()
00041 {
00042   /*TODO; get from config*/
00043   strncpy(_eol_mouse_file,"images/UI/mouse_icon.png",EOLLINELEN);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void eol_mouse_draw()
00047 {
00048   if (_eol_mouse.showHide <= 0)return;
00049   eol_sprite_draw(_eol_mouse.sprite,
00050                   _eol_mouse.frame,
00051                   _eol_mouse.x,
00052                   _eol_mouse.y);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void eol_mouse_update()
00056 {
00057   _eol_mouse.ox = _eol_mouse.x;
00058   _eol_mouse.oy = _eol_mouse.y;
00059   _eol_mouse.oldButtons = _eol_mouse.buttons;
00060   _eol_mouse.buttons = SDL_GetMouseState(&_eol_mouse.x,&_eol_mouse.y);
00061   if (_eol_mouse.buttons != _eol_mouse.oldButtons)
00062   {
00063     if (_eol_mouse.oldButtons)
00064     {
00065       _eol_mouse.lastButtons = _eol_mouse.oldButtons;
00066       _eol_mouse.lastPress = _eol_mouse.timePress;
00067       _eol_mouse.timePress = eol_graphics_get_now();
00068     }
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00072 eolBool eol_mouse_old_state(eolUint button)
00073 {
00074   eolUint mask = 1;
00075   mask = mask << button;
00076   return (_eol_mouse.oldButtons & mask);
00077 }
00078 
00079 eolBool eol_mouse_last_state(eolUint button)
00080 {
00081   eolUint mask = 1;
00082   mask = mask << button;
00083   return (_eol_mouse.lastButtons & mask);
00084 }
00085 
00086 eolBool eol_mouse_input_state(eolUint button)
00087 {
00088   eolUint mask = 1;
00089   mask = mask << button;
00090   return (_eol_mouse.buttons & mask);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void eol_mouse_get_position(eolInt *x, eolInt *y)
00094 {
00095   if (x)*x = _eol_mouse.x;
00096   if (y)*y = _eol_mouse.y;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void eol_mouse_get_motion(eolInt *dx, eolInt *dy)
00100 {
00101   if (dx)*dx = _eol_mouse.x - _eol_mouse.ox;
00102   if (dy)*dy = _eol_mouse.y - _eol_mouse.oy;
00103 }
00104 
00105 eolBool eol_mouse_in_rect(eolRect rect)
00106 {
00107   eolVec2D v;
00108   eolInt x,y;
00109   eol_mouse_get_position(&x, &y);
00110   v.x = x;
00111   v.y = y;
00112   return eol_vec_in_rect(v,rect);
00113 }
00114 
00115 eolBool eol_mouse_input_pressed(eolUint button)
00116 {
00117   return ((eol_mouse_input_state(button)) &&
00118           (!eol_mouse_old_state(button)));
00119 }
00120 
00121 eolBool eol_mouse_input_released(eolUint button)
00122 {
00123   return ((!eol_mouse_input_state(button)) &&
00124           (eol_mouse_old_state(button)));
00125 }
00126 
00127 eolBool eol_mouse_input_held(eolUint button)
00128 {
00129   return ((eol_mouse_input_state(button)) &&
00130           (eol_mouse_old_state(button)));
00131 }
00132 
00133 eolBool eol_mouse_input_double_tapped(eolUint button)
00134 {
00135   return ((eol_mouse_input_state(button)) &&
00136           (!eol_mouse_old_state(button)) &&
00137           (eol_mouse_last_state(button)) &&
00138           ((_eol_mouse.lastPress - _eol_mouse.lastPress) > 15));
00139           /*TODO the 15 needs to be brought in fromthe input config*/
00140 }
00141 
00142 void eol_mouse_hide()
00143 {
00144   _eol_mouse.showHide--;
00145 }
00146 
00147 void eol_mouse_show()
00148 {
00149   _eol_mouse.showHide++;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void eol_mouse_reset()
00153 {
00154   _eol_mouse.showHide = 0;
00155 }
